subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Alexa Glatch of the United States upset Iveta Benesova, 6-1, 6-2, to give the Americans a 1-1 tie with the Czech Republic in the opening singles of the Fed Cup semifinals. Petra Kvitova defeated Bethanie Mattek-Sands, 6-3, 7-6 (2), in the first match on the indoor hardcourt at Rondo Arena in Brno.
